title: Shoe Size Outlier
question_text: The dotplot below shows the shoe sizes for a group of $31\text{ nine-year-old girls}$ . Which of the following is the MOST plausible conclusion that can be made from the dotplot? Loading question supplement...

choices.text: The shoe size of 10 10 should be thrown out.
Most of the girls have shoe sizes greater than 5 5 .
One of the girls' shoe sizes was accidentally recorded as a 10 10 instead of a 1 1 .
Most of the girls have a shoe size of 2 2 or less.
None of the above statements is plausible.
